nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Ms. Person1, I had ordered both tumor markers, adding the CEA (just another marker in this situation) to the CA27.29 and agree that the CA27.29 has been a very good marker for you. I was happy to see that this was trending down. We do not have  a comparison for the CEA, but if this serves us value in the future, we will then have something to look back and compare to. Take care, RDL   ----- Message ----- From:  Sent:  To: Subject: RE: Visit Follow-Up Question  Hi Dr Person2, At our last appointment we discussed getting the cancer antigen test at my next blood work. I thought we were doing the CA 27 Dash 29 that I have always had done but no results have come in for that. A test result for CEA came in but I don't know what that is. I have nothing to compare that to although it appears the numbers pretty high which is concerning. I was wondering if there was a reason for switching to a different test? The 27/29 has been a good indicator for me in the past. Thank you
